title: Adjust README to reflect the need for a <div id="bluesky-comments">
body:
I struggled for a couple of days to get this working before realising that I just needed to add ```
``` in the relevant part of my site's code. Perhaps I'm too much of a web dev newbie to know that that should have been obvious, but perhaps a mention in the README to include the div would be useful for others in my position?
author: 0d-billie

comments.body: Yikes, that is definitely a dumb oversight. Sorry about that!
